data.name: The friendly name of the Power Pet Door
data.host: The host of the Power Pet Door
data.port: The port for the Power Pet Door (default: 3000)
data.timeout: How long to wait for a reply from the Power Pet Door after a command is issued (seconds)
data.reconnect: How long to wait before attempting to reconnect to the Power Pet Door after disconnection (seconds)
data.keep_alive: How often to send a PING to the Power Pet Door (seconds)
data.refresh: How often to request the current configuration of the Power Pet Door (seconds)
data.update: How often to update the current door position (seconds)

error.connection_timed_out: Timed out waiting for connection to remote host
error.connection_failed: Could not connect to remote host
error.write_error: Failed to send command to remote host
error.write_timed_out: Timed out attempting to write to remote host
error.read_error: Failed to receive response from remote host
error.read_timed_out: Timed out attempting to read fromremote host
error.protocol_error: Response from remote host does not match known protocol
